name: washingContaminationLevel_setValue
description: This function is used to set the contamination level on a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the contamination level.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the contamination level.

parameters.name: washingContaminationLevel
parameters.description: The value to set the contamination level.
